summary:
The International Space Station is a huge space lab where scientists do experiments. It's a joint project between five space agencies from different countries. The ISS is divided into two main parts: the Russian side and the US side. It has big solar panels and a unique structure to connect all the parts. The station orbits Earth about every 93 minutes.

People have lived on the ISS since 2000, making it the longest continuous human habitat in space. Over 200 people from many countries have visited. The ISS will keep growing with new modules and will likely keep operating until 2030.
title: International Space Station
